name: Edward Louis
description: I am a very patient man who is respectful of the needs and wants of other people. I am supportive of others even if it’s not what I really want. I’m always willing to help those whom I consider my friends. I enjoy at helping my friends reach their goals. I am very loyal to those around me especially when it involves my personal relationships. Sometimes others with fewer principles tend to take advantage of me because of my easygoing and complacent personality. I’m inclined to avoid sudden decisions, preferring to think things out first. I like to gather the facts and think things over before offering a strong opinion. I tend to dislike sudden or abrupt changes. I prefer things the way they are. “If it’s not broken, don’t fix it.” I’m a hopeless romantic.
